thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Purdie

author: Purdie
title: Purdie
text: Airtasker fills a huge gap in the modern economy, allowing services to be performed incredibly efficiently. I had an urgent issue with my apartment in melbourne while I was overseas. Using airtasker I had someone fix it within hours. My airbnb guests were satisfied and I was extremely relieved. I will use Airtasker all the time from now on for a range of tasks. Love this service!
